channel.title: [PI] Adding Donator Icon [PI]
channel.description: Hey moparscape I recently started with a clean PI and i was adding a bunch of things. I decided to add the donator status and i did the isdonor stuff but i just don't know how to add the donator icon I've looked at atleast 4 tutorials on this and i still can't figure it out I'd rather do this live on skype or TeamViewer Thank you and please help SKYPE: ooskiller1

item.title: [PI] Adding Donator Icon [PI]
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

Hey moparscape
I recently started with a clean PI and i was adding a bunch of things.
I decided to add the donator status and i did the isdonor stuff but i just don’t know how to add the donator icon
I’ve looked at atleast 4 tutorials on this and i still can’t figure it out
I’d rather do this live on skype or TeamViewer
Thank you and please help
SKYPE: ooskiller1
